file.name: hero-api.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: '1.0.0-SNAPSHOT'
  title: 'Hero API for Consul Demo'
  description: 'Hero API for Consul Demo'
tags:
  - name: hero
  - name: repository
paths:
  '/hero/heros':
    get:
      summary: Collect all heros from all repositories
      operationId: collectAllHeros
      tags:
        - hero
      responses:
        200:
          description: successfull operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/hero'
  '/hero/repositories':
    get:
      summary: Get all hero repositories
      operationId: getHeroRepositoryNames
      tags:
        - repository
      responses:
        200:
          description: successfull operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: string
  '/hero/hero/{repository}':
    post:
      summary: Add hero to the repository
      operationId: addHeroToRepository
      tags:
        - hero
      parameters:
        - name: repository
          in: path
          description: Repository to use
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/hero"
      responses:
        201:
          description: Successfull created
        404:
          description: Repository not found
        409:
          description: The hero already exists and the repository cannot handle duplicates.

components:
  securitySchemes:
    basicAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: basic
  schemas:
    hero:
      type: object
      required:
        - name
        - city
        - universum
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
          example: "Batman"
        city:
          type: string
          example: "Gotham City"
        universum:
          type: string
          enum:
            - "Marvel"
            - "DC Comics"

security:
  - basicAuth: []

servers:
  - description: SwaggerHub API Auto Mocking
    url: https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/Bermuda/hero-api/1.0.0-SNAPSHOT
  - description: Integration System
    url: https://heros.bermuda.de/
